article.title: Unveiling the AGN in IC 883: discovery of a parsec-scale radio jet

choices: The merging process of IC 883 with a companion galaxy.
The evolution of the radio morphology in IC 883 at 8.4 GHz.
The spectral energy distribution of the core in IC 883.
The location of transient radio sources detected in IC 883.

multiple_choice_question.text: What trend is illustrated by the plots in Figure 2?
choices: A decrease in flux density with increasing frequency.
The jet component showing a higher flux density than the core at all frequencies.
A relatively flat spectral index for the core between 4.9 and 8.4 GHz.
The luminosity of the core decreasing from 2012 to 2014.

multiple_choice_question.text: Formula (1) describes the flux density (Sν) of a synchrotron source.  What does the variable α represent in this formula?
According to Table 2, what change is observed in the core component of IC 883 between 2012 and 2014?
